fullplot: A British woman recalls coming of age during World War I - a story of young love, the futility of war, and how to make sense of the darkest times.
plot: A British woman recalls coming of age during World War I - a story of young love, the futility of war, and how to make sense of the darkest times.
title: Testament of Youth

tomatoes.consensus: Testament of Youth is well-acted and beautifully filmed, adding up to an enriching if not adventurous experience for fans of British period dramas.
